LandPreparation.Plowing: Plow the field to a depth of 15-20 cm to remove weeds and incorporate crop residues.
LandPreparation.Leveling: Level the field to ensure uniform water distribution.
LandPreparation.Puddling: Create a soft and muddy field by repeated plowing and harrowing while flooded.

InterCultivationOperations.Weeding: Perform manual or mechanical weeding 15-20 days after transplanting and then at 30-35 days.
InterCultivationOperations.Fertilization: Top dress with nitrogen fertilizer at different growth stages.
InterCultivationOperations.WaterManagement: Maintain 2-5 cm of water depth in the field after transplanting.
